welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Trevani, Mayotte! This charming city is known for its stunning beaches and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that Trevani has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dzaoudzi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal offers exclusive services for high-end travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
